runs.comm: over the stumps, short of length and Smith punches it through mid-wicket for a single
round the stumps to the left-hander and shorter in length again, punched it down the ground for a single
big turn into the batsman and hits the batsman on his thigh pad, lot of bounce too
fuller, on the middle and spinning in, goes for a sweep, to short fine-leg, not for runs
massive, and struck really well, it was on the length and he went after it, smacks it over deep mid-wicket for maximum!
this was slightly short of good length and he goes down to the pitch and smacks it through mid-wicket, by the time the long-on can get there and slide across, they are back for the second

short of length outside the off stump, wide enough to cut it and he goes for it, the ball does not come on to the bat and he is able to hit it to mid-on where Razzaq misfields and they are off for a single
outside edge to one pitched up and outside the off, he goes after it, gets it through the second slip and for four!
pulls his length up this time, and Smith's on the back foot now, taps it to the off side and they are away for a single
good line, good length, just on the off stump and he cannot swing his arms, instead he goes on to the front foot and defends
short, wide, smacked and straight to the backward point fielder, not well timed again
slower from the quick bowler and Gayle defends it to the off side
short of length and he goes for a pull immediately, misses the under-edge, thought there was some kind of nip back into the batsman there
smashed 'em! another short delivery and thwacked it, short-arm jabbed away to the mid-wicket fence for a four!
length ball outside the off, tries to punch it through the covers, but straight to the point fielder
slower one, short of length too and he is on the back foot, pushes it to deep square-leg for a single this time
fuller on the off stump and Gayle has effortlessly timed it through the extra-cover for four! he practically touched the ball and off it goes...
bowled him, the stumps are on ground! it was a very slow ball, it seemed to deviate just back into the batsman, Gayle played down the wrong line and the middle pole is flattened
on the off stump, punched to the off side but not for runs
shorter of length on the off stump and Smith is on the back foot and defends it back to the bowler
short of length and he wants to pull it away, more of a swivel away to the deep square-leg fence but hits his midriff.
slower one again and not so full, on the off stump and on good length, he is leaning forward and decides to push it to the covers
short of length and very wide, he opens the face of the bat, runs it down to third-man for a single
edged and does not carry! outside the off and he opens the face of the bat, with two slips in place, that is not the best of shots, but it goes on the bounce
short of length and it is a pacy delivery, he has cracked it through the point region for a four, a very good shot that!
outside the off and wider too, he wants to flash hard at it but escapes the inside edge, goes under the bat through to the keeper, keeping a tad low
slower from him, Smith waits for it and then pushes it to the off side
outside the off stump, short of length as well and opens the face of the bat and pushes it to the point fielder

bowled him again, two down now! what more, it has knocked the middle stump back much like Gayle's! the difference was that this was a pacier ball and the batsman was very late in his forward defensive stroke, the ball jagged back into him and bye-bye batsman
wow that is some shot to get off the mark, first ball! marginally outside the off stump, on the length and Bravo has driven it through extra-cover, and rather gracefully at that
fuller and defended on the front foot, inside edge to the leg side for a single
outside the off stump and swinging away from the batsman, Bravo wants to play it in the same vein as his previous one but the movement away beats the outside edge of the bat
poor ball and well stroked through the point region, was short of length and he goes for the cut, beats the diving point fielder and gets to the fence

inside edged and for a four! that was on the middle stump and seemed to be angling away before suddenly jagging back into the batsman, gets him in an awkward position but the inside edge runs away to the fence
angles away to the off stump, it is short of length too and defended to the off side
short and wide outside the off stump but that one that swung back in seemed to have made him a bit circumspect, mistimes it to the point fielder
short of length, pushes it to the deep square-leg fielder for a single
fuller from round the stumps, driven stylishly through the covers and rolls to the extra-cover region, long-off runs across to field it well
shorter from Gazi and he is on the back foot, pushes it to the off side for a single
shorter in the length and he is quickly on the back foot, crunches it through the covers for a single
on the leg stump, quicker, and nudged away to short fine-leg for a leg-bye
fuller and turning into the batsman, he tucks it away to short mid-wicket and wants to go for a single but is sent back
on the middle stump from over the stumps and defended it to the left of the bowler
down the leg side and left alone by the batsman, wide called
outside the off stump, half-volley length and Bravo smacks it to long-on on the full, the fielder is a yard away from the ball and he fails to get his body in the way
on the middle stump, driven to mid-on this time
fuller on the off, turning back and pushed to the mid-on region again
quicker and slight turn back, shorter too and he is on the back foot, wants to flick it away, but gets it to short mid-wicket
fuller and quicker, pushed to the off side for a single
fuller on the middle stump and he is down the ground and smacks it over long-on for a humongous six! taking on Mahmudullah first ball of his spell
outside the off and very full, he goes for a smashing drive and is timed well too but good work by Tamim at long-off restricts it to one
airborne for a six over mid-wicket! he goes down the track and it looked like he hadn't timed the ball too well, but still manages to get the result
he goes down the track yet again, the bowler sends it quicker on the off stump
short of length, turns away from beats the outside edge of the bat, trying to cut it away
shorter in the length and punched back down the ground to long-off for a single
down the track and that has been spanked over the long-on fence, he looked classy going down and classier when it went all the way!
tries to go down again and this is shorter, hit to short mid-wicket
on the length from the over the wicket, on the off stump and hurries the batsman into defending it
blazed away through the covers, it was on the off stump and a half volley, he smashes it through the vacant region on the off side for a four
slower on the off and bit of turn, smothered and tucked away to the leg side for a single
shorter and slower this time and he goes back and defends to the off side
outside the off stump and on the length, he wants to smack it through the covers, hits it to the fielder
short of length, on the middle stump and pushed it to mid-wicket for a single
on the off stump and he tries to guide it through the slips, seems to be a dropped catch by Rahim, a big deviation there and a difficult chance
fuller and carves it inside out and over the deep cover fielder for a four
short of length and he plays it to the off side, opens the face of the bat, not for runs though
not trying to pitch it up to the batsman and Samuels is quickly on to the back foot and dabs it to the right of the bowler, quickly-taken run there
short of length, way outside the off but slower, he tries to cut it away but mistimed to the deep cover fence
short of length from round the stumps, pushed down to long-on for a single
goes down the track, almost adjusts his stroke after he sees that he is not quite there because of the pace and smokes it over long-on for another six!
shorter and cut away to deep covers for a single
gone this time, stumped! he was going down the track to smack it over the in-field, misses the turn and Rahim stumps him easily and rather softly as compared to his stumping of Powell last game!
outside the off and no turn, he was going after the cut and did that rather uppishly, falls short of the fielder at short point
dropped, again! bounce for the bowler and Samuels continues to open the face of the bat, hits it and Rahim, who is up to the bat, drops the outside edge
short of length and this time he he pushes it to the off side
on his pads and Samuels is able to whip it to deep square-leg for a single
short of length outside the off and pushes it through the covers for a single
short of length yet again and it almost does not come on as quickly as the batsman would have wanted, pushed to the off side
on the length and drifts on to his pads, flicked away to the deep square-leg region for a run
outside the off, and very, very wide in fact, lets it go for a wide
short of length from round the stumps, defended on the back foot and back to the bowler
mishit for a six! what a stroke over the bowler's head, it was wider and he went for it given the room, goes straight up and the ball got both, the height and the distance for a six!
shorter outside the off, wants to cut it away hard but gets it as far as backward point only
outside the off and slower, he looked to be going down the track before stopping and defending it to the off side
down the leg side and a very difficult stumping missed. he was going down to spank it over, misses it completely down the leg side and so did Rahim, goes through for five wides!
shorter in length and cut away to the deep cover region for a single
outside the off and slog swept it for a six! Pollard seemed to have tasted blood last game and he is continuing smacking those on a much better batting track here, this time to one that is fuller too
on the off stump and there is a lot of bounce on that, defended on the back foot, to the off side
fuller on the off stump and defended to the off side, away for a single
short of length on the middle stump and defended back to the bowler, good bowling from the new-comer

bowled him, excellent stuff this time! two dropped catches off him and this time he decides to go the other route, went for the pull but the ball sneaks it under the bat and for the third time today, the stumps are on the floor (well fourth, if you add the stumping!)
short of length, seemed like he rolled his fingers over it, pushes it to the leg side
outside the off, swinging away from the batsman and he punches it to the covers, not for any run
shot sir, he is being missed many a times today by the Bangladeshis and he is certainly making them pay whenever he can, goes down the track and hits it over the bowler's head for a flat six!
down the track and mistimes that one, gets bit of an edge to the leg side
shot again and this is the best of the lot, very flat, very quick and he goes inside out after using the feet to get to the pitch of the ball, over the covers for another six!
down the track and punches it to long-on for a single
fuller on the off stump and pushes it to the covers for a single
on the middle stump and on length, he pushes it to mid-wicket for a single
good length bowling this and the batsman is on the back foot, defending it back to the bowler
slightly fuller and on the off, gets bit of an inside edge and it rolls over to square-leg for a single
on the off stump, punched down the ground for a single, it was slightly slower this time
short of length and tucked away to the mid-wicket region, both the bowler and the keeper rush towards it and restrict it to one
fuller on the off stump, change in pace to end an excellent spell from Ziaur, only 16 from his four overs, well done!
outside the off, and he goes for a slash, does not latch on to it, umpire does not give it a wide
shot sir, flat as you can get over the fence, this is fuller and he smashes it over extra cover for a six, the left leg was quickly taken away and smacked it...a bit of Abdul Razzaq in that shot
slower ball outside the off stump and he waits for it before cracking it through the covers for a single
on his pads and that is flicked over mid-wicket for a four, there seemed to be a bit of swing back into the batsman and he did well to account for it and smash it away
good length ball and he takes it from the off stump, smashes it away to the deep point fence, well almost because Tamim slides to his right to field that one and restrict it to two
but there is no-one to stop it this, it was short, wide and slashed over the point fielder and no way could the deep fielders get anywhere close to the ball, goes for a four
very slow outside the off and he waits for it to come on to his bat and then punches it through the covers for a couple of runs, gets him his fifty off only 35 balls
short of length and slower yet again, he goes over to long-on for a single, mistimed that one
another one that is rather slow, in fact this is the slowest of the lot and by the time it arrived, the batsman had already played his pull, gets he toe of the bat to the off side for a run
continues to bowl them slower and makes it difficult for the batsmen, it was short enough to pull but does not get anywhere in the middle of the bat
not too much pace on that one either, was shorter and he pulls it away but without too much timing and it goes to deep square-leg
short of length and he swivels around to get it in the gap, runs away to the fence for the first four of what was otherwise an excellent over
fuller on the middle and stump and he swings his bat, goes over the bowler's head but to the fielder at long-off and for a single

excellent shot over the extra-cover region for a six, it was a lot of room outside the off and slower too, he wanted to smack it over point by giving himself room but seeing it slower he adjusts his shot and deposits to the extra-cover
and another one, six this time over mid-wicket! it was a quicker one and not as short as you would expect, also on the off stump and Samuels has sent it over the fence with utmost ease

not good bowling, but one has to feel for the bowler here, it was fuller on the middle stump, attempted a yorker but it turns out to be a good length ball that has been thwacked over long-on for a six!
slashed away over the covers for a four, this was outside the off and he was on the back foot waiting and connects well, 23 so far
that is right into the block-hole and Samuels has gone after him yet again, smacked it over long-on for the fourth six of the over, whoa!
